languages.text: "Ты не боишься дерзить {mf|тому|той}, кто только что вытащил{mf||а} тебя с арены живым?"
"You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"
languages.original_text: "Ты не боишься дерзить {mf|тому|той}, кто только что вытащил{mf||а} тебя с арены живым?"

traits.locale_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"
"You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"
"You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"
"You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

languages.text: “你好大的胆子，竟敢不尊重刚刚把你活着拖出竞技场的人？”
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: “你好大的胆子，竟敢不尊重刚刚把你活着拖出竞技场的人？”

languages.text: 「アリーナから生かし、連れ出してくれた相手に不敬を働くとは、随分な神経だな​？」
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: 「アリーナから生かし、連れ出してくれた相手に不敬を働くとは、随分な神経だな​？」

languages.text: «¿Tienes el descaro de faltar al respeto a la persona que acaba de salvarte sacándote a rastras de la arena?».
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Tienes el descaro de faltar al respeto a la persona que acaba de salvarte sacándote a rastras de la arena?».

languages.text: « Vous avez l'audace de manquer de respect à votre {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} ? Sans moi, vous ne seriez pas sorti vivant de cette arène. »
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez l'audace de manquer de respect à votre {mf|sauveur|sauveuse} ? Sans moi, vous ne seriez pas sorti vivant de cette arène. »

languages.text: "Ihr wagt es, respektlos mit der Person umzuspringen, die Euch gerade lebend aus der Arena geschleppt hat?"
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wagt es, respektlos mit der Person umzuspringen, die Euch gerade lebend aus der Arena geschleppt hat?"

languages.text: "Seni arenadan sağ salim kurtaran kişiye ne cüretle saygısızlık ediyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "You have the nerve to disrespect the person who just dragged you out of the arena alive?"

traits.locale_text: "Seni arenadan sağ salim kurtaran kişiye ne cüretle saygısızlık ediyorsun sen?"
